Package ca.uqac.lif.labpal.table

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TableTransformation
    Transforms a data table into another data table
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Composition
    A table transformation made by chaining multiple transformations one after the other.
    DataTable
    A table made of concrete values
    ExpandAsColumns
    Transforms a table by expanding the values of one column as column headers.
    ExperimentTable
    Table whose rows and columns are populated from the parameters of a set of experiments
    Join
    Joins multiple tables on the values of specific columns.
    NormalizeColumns
    Replaces the content of each entry by its fraction of the sum of all values for the column
    NormalizeRows
    Replaces the content of each entry by its fraction of the sum of all values for the row
    RelativizeRows
    Replaces each value of the input table by the ratio of this value to the smallest value in the row
    RenameColumns
    Table built by renaming the columns of another table
    RowIterator  
    Table
    A multi-dimensional array of values.
    TableEntry
    An entry in a data table
    TableNode  
    TableRow  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Table.Type
    The types of values that a data cell can have
